Merging tiles into common maps

This simple command line uses the gdalwarp function http://www.gdal.org/gdalwarp.html to merge tiles into a common map. You have to run it from a terminal within the correct folder. 

 gdalwarp  -srcnodata "-9999"  -dstnodata "-9999" -of GTiff -ot Int16 -wt Int16     *.asc   ITAveg.tif
